extends android.app.Fragment

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Tasks.TaskCardOnClickListener
      onClickListener that is used to open the TaskEditActivity when a card Task Card is clicked it fetches the id of the Task, puts it in an Intent so that the TaskEditActivity can fetch the Task in Realm.
